item.title: GSoC'22 project introduction and tentative plan
item.description: I applied for Google Summer of Code 2022 to work with NumPy’s F2PY maintainence team and improve F2PY under Python Software Foundation. Breifly said, F2PY is a CLI that provides an easy connection between Python and Fortran languagues. I have previously dicussed F2PY on my website on the topics Scipy, Fortran and F2PY and F2PY tests. During my time of application, F2PY’s frontend was a handwritten command line parser with handwritten interfacing.
